page.title: 02THE GAME-KEEPERS YEAR
page.content: { { {THE GAME-KEEPER'S YEAR. Mr. Reid is stalker, gamekeeper and shepherd at Clunes(782671) His year starts in spring with lambing, shooting hoodies(hooded crows) and foxes. He goes on fox drives with other local keepers, because foxes kill weakly lambs and grouse. At this time of year he has to burn the old woody heather in parts, because the old heather gives cover (protection) to the grouse, while the young green shoots from the burnt heather make better feeding for the sheep and the deer. During May and June he tidies up the grounds of the lodge and puts weed-killer on the drives. He clips his sheep, dips them to kill off pests like ticks,and keels them i.e. he
